ygData.subject: RE: more sylly questions
ygData.msgSnippet: If a ranger or druid snares a mob and then you decide to chain it for whatever reason, the chain song being last in will strip or break or over-ride the snare.
ygData.messageBody:
If a ranger or druid snares a mob and then you decide to chain it for
whatever reason, the chain song being last in will strip or break or
over-ride the snare. Same for root. The same goes for the darkness spell -
but there my SK cousin yells at me because it canceled also the hp degrade
effects too. Darkness degrades hp and slows target.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 10, 1999 1:17 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] more sylly questions


From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

Can you give more clarification on what you mean here? Did you intend to say
Chain breaks root versus snare? Also, what do you mean by breaking darkness
line DOTs. Never heard that one mentioned before.

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci


> Some of this are what I would consider common game knowledge (ie invis
> killing pets, Bellow breaking mesmerize since it is an attack). I did
> mention the snare breaks root, but should have mentioned that it can kill
> darkness line DoT's.
>

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
